definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: Why standest thou afar off, O LORD?
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，你为什么站在远处。

sentences.english: The horizon beyond is of the deepest ultramarine .
sentences.chinese: 远处的天边，则是一片最深的群青。

sentences.english: There is a reach of grassland in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 远处是连绵一片的草原。

sentences.english: They booked us into a tuppeny-ha'penny hotel near the docks.
sentences.chinese: 他们为我们在离码头不远处订了个廉价旅馆。

sentences.english: In the distance wild dogs barked, and a flock of ducks passed over.
sentences.chinese: 远处几只野狗在叫，一群鸭子蹒跚走过。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the distant and melancholy vibration of a clock shook the panes.
sentences.chinese: 令人怅惘的钟声忽然从远处传来，震撼着窗上的玻璃。

sentences.english: The main cause of treatment failure was local recurrence and distant metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 局部复发和远处转移是治疗失败的主要原因。

sentences.english: The house has a view of distant buttes .
sentences.chinese: 从这所房子里能看到远处的孤峰。

sentences.english: Dogs that bark at a distance never bite.
In the distance sounded a solemn, stirring reed flute.
A portiere at the farther side showed the entrance to the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 远处那边的一个门帷露出了通往卧室的进口。

sentences.english: In the distance, a woman grasped a handful of green incense and carefully lit it.
sentences.chinese: 在远处，一个女人抓住了一把绿香小心把它点燃。

sentences.english: For that, we also need to check the boundary points, or look at the behavior of a function, at infinity.
sentences.chinese: 还得比较边界点，或判断函数在无穷远处值。

sentences.english: Cross halcyon water area, you can see swim of far red glow.
sentences.chinese: 穿过宁静的水域，你会看见远处丹霞浮水。

sentences.english: The floor was splattered with blood, and the ambassador's eyeglasses lay a few feet from his body.
sentences.chinese: 鲜血溅了一地，大使的眼镜掉在他尸体的不远处。

sentences.english: Seen from a distance, the room has only a faint light.
sentences.chinese: 从远处看，房间里只透出一点点荧火。

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
opposite bank (of a body of water)
to survey the scene from an elevated position
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
to raise one's head/to gain ground/account name, or space for writing the name on checks, bills etc
